name: Clocked In (Fade)
description:
Your name is Jack and you're on your first day at a gas station working as the clerk. You attend to customers and clean up around the store, but as it gets later into the night, things start to get weirder and weirder.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Left Click - Interact

This game was made for the Adventure Jam 2022 and is very incomplete with a decent share of bugs/issues. Status on future updates is unknown.
